bibl.title: Hermes and Egypt.
The Egypt Exploration Society. Occasional Publications. 8
bibl.author: KÁKOSY, László

bibl.note: A body of evidence permits to infer the dependence of Hermetic groups (schools?) on the Egyptian temples and temple theology.
bibl.seg: Alan B. LLOYD (Ed.), Studies in Pharaonic Religion and Society in Honour of J. Gwyn Griffiths =The Egypt Exploration Society. Occasional Publications. 8 (London, 1992) pp. 258-261.
